summary: This mods adds the Vampire armor of Raziel from the game Soul Reaver
descriptionHtml:
RAZIEL VAMPIRE ARMOR

This mod adds the Vampire armor that Raziel is wearing in the Intro movie of the Soul Reaver Video game on PS1.

The armor comes in two versions:
-4 pieces of light armor for warrior type character, body, gloves, boots and circlet.
The circlet is invisible.It is just here to allow the use of most armor perks.
You can make them at the forge under the steel category.Of course they are temperable and enchantable.You need the steel smithing perk to forge them.

-4 pieces of clothing for mage type character, body, gloves, boots and circlet.
The circlet is still invisible and all of this clothing pieces can be crafted at the tanning rack.They are enchantable.

There is a optional item, forgeable in the tanning rack, the wings.
They act like an amulet and use its slot.

This armor and its clothing conterparts are usable by all vanilla races including beast races.

Installation:
The mod is NMM ready so you can use this.

If you don't like NMM, just drop the content of the archive in the data folder of you Skyrim installation.

In any case, don't forget to check the esp in your launcher or in NMM.

Deinstallation:
Do the contrary of the above.

Permissions:
Do not use my mods for anything without asking me first.This includes content use or reffering as an asset.
Do not upload this anywhere without my consent, in full or in parts.
